actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to revise the formula for payments to States for care furnished to veterans in State homes.

summary.text: Revises the formula for payments made by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to States for nursing home, domiciliary, and hospital care furnished to veterans who are eligible to receive such care in a facility of the Department of Veterans Affairs, but who instead receive such care in a State home.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to revise the formula for payments to States for care furnished to veterans in State homes.
